devdoc.author: rube-de
devdoc.details: This contract is used to register and manage brokerbots

params.base: The address of the base currency
params.brokerbot: The address of the registered brokerbot
params.token: The address of the share token

params.brokerbot: The brokerbot address that is synced
The address of the brokerbot to deactivate

returns.brokerbots: An array of active brokerbot addresses
An array of all registered brokerbot addresses

registerBrokerbot(address,address).details: Per network, only one active brokerbot should exist per base/share token pair

params._brokerbot: The brokerbot contract to be registered

syncBrokerbot(address).details: This event is useful for indexers/subgraphs to update token balances which are not tracked with other events

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Brokerbot Registry

BrokerbotDeactivated(address).notice: Emitted when a brokerbot is deactivated

BrokerbotRegistered(address,address,addr.notice: Emitted when a brokerbot is registered

BrokerbotSync(address).notice: Emitted when calling the syncBrokerbot function

getBrokerbot(address,address).notice: Returns the brokerbot address for a given base and share token pair, or address 0 if it does not exist

userdoc.notice: Holds a registry of all deployed active brokerbots

t_mapping(t_contract(IERC20)705,t_mappin.label: mapping(contract IERC20 => mapping(contract IERC20 => contract IBrokerbot))
